name: 4K Bricks Breaker
description:
Classic bricks breaker game expanded by weapons.

If you can't break a brick using your ball, You can also shot them using a rifle, plasma gun, or smash by laser.

Features:
- Google Play High Scores
- Achievements (collect Google eXPerience Points)
- 3 types of ball:
- standard
- spikeball (weaker against brick, but dangerous against Your stick)
- fire-ball (destroy everything on the way, taking a little damage)
- 5 types of weapon: short ammo gun, machine gun, plasma gun, plasma machine gun, laser (low damage but ultra fire rate, fry them all)
- 21 levels (in beta version, more lvls soon)
